channel.title: "Your RS account is hacked"- help please?
channel.description: I ran egderspkers (or whatever you call it) and a couple of mins past and a message box came up saying "Your RS account is hacked". I thought it came up to scare me so I was like "prawh!" :P So I went to post this until Chrome got exited. Switched it off straight away (I thought it needed my connection so he can controll my copmuter) I don't even play rs anymore. I always knew this day would happen. So what should I do?

item.title: "Your RS account is hacked"- help please?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

purestmage74:

Same shit for me, my dumbass had AVG off for a while… (needed to update)

AVG sucks balls. I ran it when i had 2 trojans, and another virus and AVG didn’t find it in the AppData folder. Get antiMalware Bytes.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

Hot_Potato:

Well I learned my lesson at least.

my lesson was dling a stupid leeched source a year ago on r-s and the same one just re-named on rl, it had a backdoor, rat and a fucking worm.

My solution: Save my important programs to my usb (with my antivirus running on my usb) and then formatting.

item.title: "Your RS account is hacked"- help please?
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:41, topic:418079”][quote author=recker450 link=topic=520626.msg3782912#msg3782912 date=1318634461]
kaspersky anti virus 2012 code(1 year)
ZHFTQ-42QFZ-B1EJY-6ZN24

i tried it and it works for me about 2-3 weeks ago
not sure if this key is overused yet.

[size=1pt]NUS4T-GKF2R-17SCB-4CKPN (90 days)
D9SFG-NUA2E-FUVMW-TE32W[/size]
[/quote]

I’ll try that. Thanks.[/quote]
no problem, but im not sure if the key has been overused yet

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:38, topic:418079”][quote author=purestmage74 link=topic=520626.msg3782773#msg3782773 date=1318630260]
Learn to virus scan?
You’re a joke every post i make your ass shows up with some ‘l2dothisShit’ Maybe if you knew what i was dealing with but you don’t…
VIRUS SCANS DONT FIND BOTS.
mk bud.
Tried AVG, tried MalwareBytes, now all else failed im turning to my haxor friends, already since i’ve ran this program his connection to my pc has been ‘Disabled’.
This program allows me to go through back doors.
If i can’t kill a process in the task manager ‘Access is denied’ i can kill it with this program no problem.
Doubt he wants me re-releasing
[/quote]

l2safemode[/quote]lmao

Read full topic

item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Stupit:

Grab his IP and give it to me. I have a few thousand shells that I could use.

First of all, thats just cute that you think you know what your doing, but ddosing stuff is childs play my friend.

OT: You should be able to recover your account if your from the same IP that you made it on or if you have the right password.

Btw (63k shells), it took all of 30 seconds to get those shells, stop trying to act cool mate.
